title: Hush
overview: Dr. Logan has built a successful practice discreetly catering to the between-the-sheets lives of her rich and famous clientele and publishing the definitive works on modern relationships and sexuality. With an A-list rolodex, this "relationship fixer" juggles midnight house calls for trysts gone wrong, destroys salacious content before it hits the gossip columns and hosts therapeutic couples' retreats for those in dire straits. Dr. Logan is the gatekeeper of everyone's secrets, but after she launches her "Penthouse Project", the deadly secrets of three women threaten her career and her life when a dead body is found, and the police identify her as the primary suspect.
